articles.description: In a recent interview with IGN, Sony Pictures VR confirmed that Ghostbusters VR will not be a sequel to the 2021 film Ghostbusters: Afterlife and talked about the decision to set the game in San Francisco.
articles.content:
Ghostbusters VR won't be a direct follow-up to the 2021 film Ghostbusters: Afterlife, Sony Pictures VR has confirmed to IGN.

articles.title: Something In The Water Festival Is Coming To DC - DCist
articles.description: The decision comes several months after Williams pulled the festival from his hometown of Virginia Beach, Virginia following a public rift with local leaders there.

articles.description: Oscar-winner Dustin Lance Black defends "Under the Banner of Heaven" against criticism from church-owned Deseret News at premiere event in Salt Lake City.
